sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import '../assets/css/AboutUs.css'; import '../components/Header.jsx'; const AboutUs = () => { useEffect(() => { // JavaScript Animation on Scroll - Fade In Effect const handleScroll = () => { const aboutSection = document.querySelector('.about-us'); const aboutContent = document.querySelector('.about-content'); const aboutImage = document.querySelector('.about-image img'); const scrollPosition = window.scrollY + window.innerHeight; const sectionPosition = aboutSection.offsetTop + aboutSection.offsetHeight; if (scrollPosition > sectionPosition) { aboutContent.classList.add('fade-in'); aboutImage.classList.add('image-zoom'); } else { aboutContent.classList.remove('fade-in'); aboutImage.classList.remove('image-zoom'); } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); return (
{/* Header Section */}

Iron Work Construction

Expert Solutions for Residential, Commercial & Industrial Projects

View Our Projects
{/* About Section */}

About Us

Expert Ironwork Solutions for Every Project

At Iron Work Construction, we pride ourselves on delivering top-notch ironwork solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients. With over 20 years of experience in the industry, we have built a reputation for excellence, reliability, and innovation.

Our team of skilled craftsmen and engineers are dedicated to providing high-quality, durable metal structures that stand the test of time. Whether it's a custom iron gate for your home or a large-scale steel structure for a commercial project, we have the expertise to bring your vision to life.

We use only the finest materials and state-of-the-art technology to ensure that every project we undertake meets the highest standards of quality and safety. Our commitment to customer satisfaction is unwavering, and we work closely with our clients to ensure that their needs are met every step of the way.

  • Custom Ironwork Design & Fabrication
  • Residential, Commercial & Industrial Projects
  • High-Quality Materials & Craftsmanship
  • On-Time Delivery & Installation
  • Competitive Pricing & Free Consultations
{/* Projects Section */}

Our Recent Projects

Commercial Steel Building

High-quality steel structure for a large commercial building project.

Residential Iron Fencing

Custom iron fencing for residential properties, combining aesthetics and security.

Industrial Steel Structure

Strong and durable steel structure for an industrial complex.

{/* Services Section */}

Our Services

Commercial Ironwork

We specialize in creating robust and aesthetically pleasing iron structures for commercial properties.

Residential Ironwork

From custom gates to decorative railings, we enhance the beauty and security of your home.

Industrial Steel Structures

We provide durable and reliable steel structures for industrial applications.

{/* Testimonials Section */}

What Our Clients Say

"Iron Work Construction delivered beyond our expectations. Their attention to detail and quality is unmatched!"

- John Doe

"The team was professional and efficient. Our new iron gate looks stunning and is built to last."

- Jane Smith

"We highly recommend Iron Work Construction for any ironwork project. They are truly experts in their field."

- Michael Johnson

); }; export default AboutUs;
